title: I'm silver 2 and getting auto filled wtf
body: like why? i dont care if my queue time takes 20 minutes, i am a one trick pony and ONLY want 2 roles

replies.body:
Autofill becomes enabled when queue times are deemed to be "too long" due to the lack of players queuing up, or when players are all queuing for the same role. 

A lot of bronze/silver/gold players are 1-trick ponies only queuing up for mid/top, creating a massive gap to fill in terms of the other roles. Hardly anyone wants to support these days, and as a result, we need autofill to actually get some of these games going. Not everyone wants a 20 minute queue time to ensure their preferred role. Just hit up flex queue in a 5man and get your preferred role every time. 

Just think, it could be worse. 20 minute queue times in master+ just to be autofilled

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7W6mUVKK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-25T10:28:29.325+0000)
>
> Autofill becomes enabled when queue times are deemed to be "too long" due to the lack of players queuing up, or when players are all queuing for the same role. 
> 
> A lot of bronze/silver/gold players are 1-trick ponies only queuing up for mid/top, creating a massive gap to fill in terms of the other roles. Hardly anyone wants to support these days, and as a result, we need autofill to actually get some of these games going. Not everyone wants a 20 minute queue time to ensure their preferred role. Just hit up flex queue in a 5man and get your preferred role every time. 
> 
> Just think, it could be worse. 20 minute queue times in master+ just to be autofilled

its true with the 1 trick ponies statement. but if both queues are getting auto filled on oce at all times of day it shows that oce doesnt have the player base to have 2 queues. remove flex, keep solo queue, no one is and will be taking their flex queue rating seriously so it is a win/win situation.

the main problem is i am a singed one trick and well I really don't want to play singed when i get filled into support, due to known reasons from the "smite support singed" story.

also i refuse to play flex as the queue doesnt show ANY individual skill level of play its just who can make the best shot calling over a mic.

You had better learn to support because even before we had two ranked queues, people were being autofilled due to the lack of them. It isn't hard, just learn to play annie or Raka. Not even expensive champions.
I don't know why everyone hates support anyway. It's not a difficult role to do and it still have its great gaming experiences, even better then the mid/top role in some occasions.

> [{quoted}](name=Zahe Jr,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7W6mUVKK,comment-id=0000000000010001,timestamp=2016-11-26T13:13:09.320+0000)
>
> I don't know why everyone hates support anyway. It's not a difficult role to do and it still have its great gaming experiences, even better then the mid/top role in some occasions.

as a soccer player myself, I notice a lot of my friends prefer to practice penalty kicking instead of passing, tackling, goalkeeping, and many other techniques. pretty similar situation here, most players just want to kill kill and kill

it's funnier when you queue as a low silver sup/fill and someone else on your team gets autofilled into support and you get stuck with the lane they wanted. When I queue as a sup/fill main, nobody on my team should be forced to autofill but apparently it still happens.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7W6mUVKK,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-11-25T11:29:46.832+0000)
>
> You had better learn to support because even before we had two ranked queues, people were being autofilled due to the lack of them. It isn't hard, just learn to play annie or Raka. Not even expensive champions.

^ or if you want high dmg sups play brand, lux, zyra or sona

You're a Singed one trick and haven't tried the pre-season meta yet??? Are you kidding??? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Just do it.

P.S. Look on youtube on "how to avoid autofill". gbay99 has a video on that.

> [{quoted}](name=SingedUsedFling,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7W6mUVKK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-25T10:36:07.502+0000)

> its true with the 1 trick ponies statement. but if both queues are getting auto filled on oce at all times of day it shows that oce doesnt have the player base to have 2 queues. remove flex, keep solo queue, no one is and will be taking their flex queue rating seriously so it is a win/win situation.
> 
> the main problem is i am a singed one trick and well I really don't want to play singed when i get filled into support, due to known reasons from the "smite support singed" story.
> 
> also i refuse to play flex as the queue doesnt show ANY individual skill level of play its just who can make the best shot calling over a mic.

I dont get it, how hard is it to play to play support? Theres two styles of support u can play which is basically either peel or carry. You dont even need to cs
auto fill is on world wide on both ques for all levels of play, not just OCE.

I played with some players struggling with autofilled role, especially sup.
One time, i was against singed sup XD
I think people should be able to play at least 3 roles now, unless if you are a sup player.
